languages.text: "Обычный человек, встретив такое зло, сходит с ума от отчаяния, мы же не умеем страшиться. Просто не можем. Вместо этого мы испытываем невыносимый гнев. Чтобы отобрать тех, кто сможет яростно рычать в глаза немыслимому, и нужны наши испытания".

"An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."
languages.original_text: "Обычный человек, встретив такое зло, сходит с ума от отчаяния, мы же не умеем страшиться. Просто не можем. Вместо этого мы испытываем невыносимый гнев. Чтобы отобрать тех, кто сможет яростно рычать в глаза немыслимому, и нужны наши испытания".

We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “若是普通人遭遇了这样的邪恶之物，他们会由于绝望而发疯。但我们没有感受恐惧的能力，我们生来就没有这样的感觉。相反，我们只会感到无法克制的愤怒。我们必须找到那些敢于直视恐怖，还会发出怒吼的新进者，这就是为什么我们需要这样的试炼。”
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

traits.locale_text: “若是普通人遭遇了这样的邪恶之物，他们会由于绝望而发疯。但我们没有感受恐惧的能力，我们生来就没有这样的感觉。相反，我们只会感到无法克制的愤怒。我们必须找到那些敢于直视恐怖，还会发出怒吼的新进者，这就是为什么我们需要这样的试炼。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cualquier hombre normal que se encuentre con semejante maldad enloquece y desespera. Pero nosotros no conocemos el miedo. No está en nuestra naturaleza. En vez de eso, nos llena una ira incontenible. Debemos elegir a los neófitos que miran a lo impensable a los ojos y rugen. Para eso necesitamos las pruebas».
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier hombre normal que se encuentre con semejante maldad enloquece y desespera. Pero nosotros no conocemos el miedo. No está en nuestra naturaleza. En vez de eso, nos llena una ira incontenible. Debemos elegir a los neófitos que miran a lo impensable a los ojos y rugen. Para eso necesitamos las pruebas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「この悪に遭遇した普通の人間は絶望で気が狂うだろう。しかし、俺たちは恐怖を感じることができない。それはただ、俺たちの性ではないというだけだ。その代わり、耐え難い怒りを感じる。俺達は、想像を絶するものの目を見て、咆哮をあげるようなネオファイトを選ばなければならない…そのために試練が必要なのさ」
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

traits.locale_text: 「この悪に遭遇した普通の人間は絶望で気が狂うだろう。しかし、俺たちは恐怖を感じることができない。それはただ、俺たちの性ではないというだけだ。その代わり、耐え難い怒りを感じる。俺達は、想像を絶するものの目を見て、咆哮をあげるようなネオファイトを選ばなければならない…そのために試練が必要なのさ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ein gewöhnlicher Mann, der diesem Bösen begegnet, wird vor Verzweiflung wahnsinnig. Doch wir sind nicht in der Lage, Furcht zu empfinden. Es liegt schlicht nicht in unserer Natur. Stattdessen spüren wir unerträgliche Wut. Wir müssen die Neophyten auserwählen, die dem Undenkbaren in die Augen sehen und brüllen — darum brauchen wir unsere Prüfungen."
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

Es liegt schlicht nicht in unserer Natur. Stattdessen spüren wir unerträgliche Wut. Wir müssen die Neophyten auserwählen, die dem Undenkbaren in die Augen sehen und brüllen — darum brauchen wir unsere Prüfungen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « L'homme ordinaire confronté à ce mal bascule dans le désespoir et la folie. Mais nous ne pouvons pas ressentir la peur. Ce n'est tout simplement pas dans notre nature. À la place, nous n'éprouvons qu'une colère impitoyable. Nous devons choisir les néophytes qui regarderont l'impensable droit dans les yeux avant de rugir de toutes leurs forces. Voilà pourquoi ces épreuves sont nécessaires. »
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

À la place, nous n'éprouvons qu'une colère impitoyable. Nous devons choisir les néophytes qui regarderont l'impensable droit dans les yeux avant de rugir de toutes leurs forces. languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

languages.text: "Bu kötülükle yüz yüze gelen sıradan biri, çaresizlik içinde aklını kaybeder. Fakat bizler korku hissetmeyiz. Doğamızda yoktur. Onun yerine dayanılmaz bir öfkeyle dolup taşarız. Akla gelmeyecek şeylerin gözünün içine bakarken kükreyecek yenikanları seçmemiz gerekir. İmtihanlar bu yüzden gereklidir."
languages.original_text: "An ordinary man who encounters this evil will go mad with despair. But we are incapable of feeling fear. It is simply not in our nature. Instead, we feel unbearable rage. We must select the neophytes who will look into the eyes of the unthinkable and roar — that is why we need our trials."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kötülükle yüz yüze gelen sıradan biri, çaresizlik içinde aklını kaybeder. Fakat bizler korku hissetmeyiz. Doğamızda yoktur. Onun yerine dayanılmaz bir öfkeyle dolup taşarız. Akla gelmeyecek şeylerin gözünün içine bakarken kükreyecek acemileri seçmemiz gerekir. İmtihanlara bu yüzden ihtiyacımız var."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
